original_text: But my friends put me in a basket on the end of a rope. They sent me out through a window in the city wall and they let me drop to the ground. That is how I got away from the ruler of the city.
korean_text: 나는 광주리를 타고 들창문으로 성벽을 내려가 그 손에서 벗어났노라

sentences.original_text: But my friends put me in a basket
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내 친구들은 나를 바구니에 넣었고

sentences.original_text: on the end of a rope
They sent me out through a window
and they let me drop to the ground
That is how I got away
from the ruler of the city
